statements: DELETE FROM product_catalog WHERE product_id = 100 AND quantity < 5;
DELETE FROM product_catalog WHERE price > 500.00 AND quantity BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
DELETE FROM product_images WHERE product_id = 7 AND image_id = 3;
DELETE FROM products WHERE product_id = 100 AND product_name = 'Test Product';
DELETE FROM ProductInventory WHERE available_quantity < 10 AND location = 'Warehouse';
DELETE FROM ProductCategories WHERE product_id = 1 AND category_id = 2;
DELETE FROM product_reviews WHERE reviewer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM product_images WHERE product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM product_catalog WHERE category = 'Electronics');
